mapper.select: SELECT customer_id, password, name, birth_date, gender, phone, email, address, role, reg_date FROM customer ORDER BY reg_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (customer_id, password, name, birth_date, gender, phone, email, address, role) VALUES (#{customerId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address}, 'ROLE_USER')
mapper.update: UPDATE customer SET name = #{name}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, gender = #{gender}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, address = #{address} WHERE customer_id = #{customerId}
